name: Dzenaria
body:
# The responsibility
## The responsibility of the author
The author is not responsible for failures and use the software for personal gain.

This software was created for fun, when the author studied the mechanism to connect third-party application in the project and the impact on him.

The author is not responsible for the quality of translation into English, because he taught German at school. Blame It "Google Translayte." XD

## Personal responsibility
Using this software you will take full responsibility for broken software and hardware for themselves.

By using this software in a multiplayer game (yes, all manipulations are working and there ^_^), you run the risk of being banned if breaking the rules of the server.

Also, you can break the laws of your country and you will have to answer before the law.

***

# Features
1. Ghost (Invulnerability)
2. Heal
3. Mana infusion
4. Aqualung (Breathing under water)

***

# Plans
1. GPS (navigate to good blocks)
2. Coins
3. Good items
4. Meteorite spam
5. Complete this page
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
